location: Huanhe South Road Section 2, near Longshan Temple MRT (485m)
notes: 2BR/1BA move-in ready unit on 14th floor with elevator, all rooms have windows and balcony for natural light. Comes fully furnished with appliances. Baby safety concerns: balcony access needs childproofing; high floor is good for air quality but verify balcony railing height. Wanhua is an older district - building modernity unclear from description. No pets allowed; management fee NT$2,300/month additional.
